We are building a project that will be of the next.js framework with a headless wordpress backend. The project will be a directory for painting companies in Ann Arbor Michigan, The website is paintinga2.com. The website will have a homepage, about page, services page, contact page, and a blog section. The blog section will have individual blog posts that can be created and managed through the headless wordpress backend. The website will be responsive and optimized for SEO. The design of the website will be modern and clean, with a focus on user experience. The website will also have a contact form that will allow users to get in touch with the painting companies listed on the directory. The contact form will be integrated with a third-party service like Formspree or EmailJS to handle form submissions. The website will also have social media integration, allowing users to share blog posts and pages on their social media accounts. Overall, the goal of the project is to create a user-friendly and visually appealing directory for painting companies in Ann Arbor Michigan that is easy to navigate and provides valuable information to users. SEO optimization will be a key focus, with the use of relevant keywords, meta tags, and other techniques to improve the website's visibility in search engine results.
